title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Demographic analysis and projections in City Planning; Ranking and Scaling; Applications of Probabilistic Modeling in City Planning; Applications of Queuing Theory in City Planning; Applications of Network Models in City Planning; Simulation in the Urban Context. Implementation Problems.
